name: Save Christmas (alasayvan)
description:
Save Christmas

The game is created for mobile platforms. It's a prototype and developed to gain more skills on SOLID principles.

HOW TO PLAY

After click on Play button, you have tap anywhere to let the game begin. After that collect the presents using your mouse. You may switch left or right positions. Just click and swipe with your mouse left button.

TEAM

İbrahim Furkan Kodak

Yunus Sarıca
